TopicTitle: Crossfeed enable in VAB not working

Articles.Content: I have a built a drone bomber with small hardpoints with fuel tanks attached and have enabled crossfeed in VAB.  This still does not allow fuel to be used by the jet engine.  I know this conflicts with the other bugs I have made on jet engines but that is just what I see with this creation.  However choosing crossfeed on for any of the hardpoints immediately enables crossfeed for all.
